variable.name: baby_SUBJID
variable.comment: De-identified ID.

variable.name: ab
variable.description: Total number of abortions the mother has had.
variable.comment: Includes spontaneous (miscarriages), elective (therapeutic for maternal health or maternal request), and unspecified abortions.

variable.name: ab_elec
variable.description: Number of elective/voluntary abortions the mother has had.
variable.comment: Therapeutic for maternal health or maternal request.

variable.name: ab_spont
variable.description: Number of spontaneous abortions the mother has had.
variable.comment: Miscarriages.

variable.name: ab_unspec
variable.comment: Abortions that occurred but reason is unknown.

variable.name: ante_hem
variable.description: Mother had antenatal hemorrhage or vaginal bleeding.
variable.comment: More than just light spotting at any time in pregnancy.

variable.name: site3_bpd
variable.comment: BPD was diagnosed if a child was born at gestational age 32 weeks or less OR with birth weight less than 1500 grams. If this criteria is fulfilled, then child must also have an X-ray consistent with BPD and be on oxygen at 36 weeks gestational age.

variable.name: site3_chorio
variable.comment: Mother had to have a fever and one of the following 4 other concerns: maternal temperature during labor ever greater than 38.0 degrees C, white blood cell count greater than 18,000, uterine tenderness, or purulent discharge.

variable.name: chron_hyper
variable.comment: Maternal high blood pressure not related to pregnancy, treated. Systolic BP >140, Diastolic BP > 90.

variable.name: dcO2
variable.comment: Child was discharged from hospital on oxygen. Child must maintain saturations greater than 94 in order to be discharged without oxygen.

variable.name: deceased
variable.comment: Child died during initial hospital stay.

variable.name: del_vac
variable.comment: Whether or not a vacuum was used to assist in delivery of child.

variable.name: site3_delivery
variable.comment: Vaginal (vaginal vertex, vaginal breech, or vaginal other presentation), Cesarean (C-section without labor or C-section labor not specified), vacuum, or C-section after labor.

variable.name: diab_type2
variable.comment: Mother with adult-onset diabetes; diet +/- insulin.

variable.name: ecmo
variable.description: Child was on extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) at some point.

variable.name: ethnic
variable.comment: Child's ethnicity as determined by parent self-report.

variable.name: ga_tot
variable.comment: Determined from gestational age by dates.

variable.name: gaday
variable.description: Additional days of gestation after a specific week.
variable.comment: If a child is not born exactly on a gestational week (e.g. 27 weeks gestational age), this specifies how many additional days there were in the week before the child was born (e.g. 27 weeks, 3 days).

variable.name: gaweek
variable.comment: Gestational age in weeks.

variable.name: gest_diab
variable.comment: Gestational diabetes was diagnosed if there were 2 or more abnormal results on the three hour glucose tolerance test. Abnormal results were greater than 95 when fasting, greater than 180 at one hour, greater than 155 at two hours, and greater than 140 at three hours.

variable.name: gest_hyper
variable.comment: Mother experienced hypertension during gestation not accompanied by high levels of proteins, etc. seen in preeclampsia.

variable.name: hist_chorio
variable.comment: Determined by anatomic pathology of the placenta.

variable.name: int_conv
variable.description: Child ventilated using a conventional ventilator.

variable.name: int_hffi
variable.description: Child ventilated using a high frequency flow interrupter.

variable.name: int_hfov
variable.description: Child ventilated using a high frequency oscillatory ventilator.

variable.name: site3_ivh
variable.description: Child had any grade of intraventricular hemorrhage on either side of brain.

variable.name: site3_ivh_grade
variable.description: Highest level intraventricular hemorrhage/either side of brain.

variable.name: site3_labor
variable.comment: Type of labor the mother experienced with child.

variable.name: site1/2/3_mar_stat
variable.description: Mother's marital status at time of delivery.

variable.name: site3_mat_educ
variable.description: Maternal education level at time of delivery.
variable.value: College Degree/4-year College or Bachelors Degree

variable.name: ncpap
variable.description: Number of days the child was on nasal cpap.

variable.name: site3_nec
variable.comment: Presence of pneumatosis intestinalis and/or perforation and/or portal venous air as found on X-ray or in surgery. 'Suspected' means that the infant was treated clinically, but did not have pneumatosis or require surgery.

variable.name: site1/2/3_mult_birth
variable.description: Is child a multiple e.g. twin, triplet?

variable.name: O2_dur
variable.description: Number of days the child was on oxygen.

variable.name: ofc
variable.description: Child's occipital frontal circumference in centimeters at birth.

variable.name: para
variable.description: Total number of live births the mother has had.

variable.name: pat_ethn
variable.comment: Which of the following best describes the ethnicity of the father of the child; reported by the mother or father.

variable.name: pat_race
variable.comment: Which of the following best describes the race of the father of the child; reported by the mother or father

variable.name: pre_atb
variable.description: Antibiotics administered during pregnancy or labor.

variable.name: pre_ster
variable.description: Steroids given before delivery; prenatal steroids given for fetal lung maturity, not for maternal disease.

variable.name: preeclamp
variable.description: Mother experienced pre-eclampsia during the pregnancy.

variable.name: race
variable.description: Which of the following best describes the child's race; reported by mother or father.
variable.comment: Other' includes American Indian, Alaska Native, Asian, Native Hawaiian, Pacific Islander, and other.
variable.value: Other (American Indian, Alaska Native, Asian, Native Hawaiian, Pacific Islander, and other)

variable.name: rom
variable.description: Whether rupture of membrane was spontaneous or artificial.

variable.name: rom_days
variable.description: Duration of membrane rupture before delivery in days.

variable.name: rom_add_hours
variable.description: These hours are in addition to duration of membrane rupture in days.

variable.name: rop
variable.description: Child diagnosed with any retinopathy of prematurity.
variable.comment: The highest stage of retinopathy of prematurity in either eye.

variable.name: seiz
variable.comment: Suspected' was documented if an observation of a seizure was made by other personnel, but not by a physician. 'Yes' only includes seizures observed and documented by a physician.

variable.name: sepsis
variable.description: Child was diagnosed with sepsis and the diagnosis is confirmed by a positive blood, urine, or CSF culture.

variable.name: cong
variable.description: Child has congenital anomalies or major malformations.

variable.name: toco
variable.description: Mother was given tocolytics during the pregnancy to delay labor.

variable.name: vent_dur
variable.description: Number of days mechanical ventilator was required for child.
